name: Space Plumber (Vicente Murgui Sanchis)
description:
Pepe is the boss leading the cleanning department of the space hotel. While travelling the galaxy, suddenly the security system malfunction, so he has to repair the core security controller while preventing the toilets leaking before the customers arrive.

In this game, you will take controll of Pepe and you will need to fix the security system (by loading a yellow bar) while trying to prevent the bathrooms from flooding (represented by the brown bars on the sides of the toilets). For this, you will have two habilities, one for clean the toilets quickly and other to open the doors that are closed.
